mapper.select:
SELECT PLNT_CD, HIR_CD, CD_DIV_SU, HIR_CD_NM, HIR_CD_ORD, USE_YN, HIR_DESC, TO_CHAR(UDT_DS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DS, UDT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER SU WHERE SU.USER_ID = A.UDT_UID) AS UDT_NM FROM SY_CD_HIR A WHERE 1=1
AND PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND CD_DIV_SU = 'U'
AND CD_DIV_SU = 'S'
AND HIR_CD_NM LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{hirCdNm})) || '%'
AND USE_YN = #{useYn}
ORDER BY CD_DIV_SU, HIR_CD_ORD
mapper.insert:
SELECT #{cdDivSu} || LPAD(NVL((SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(HIR_CD, -3)) FROM SY_CD_HIR WHERE CD_DIV_SU = #{cdDivSu}),0)+1, 3, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SY_CD_HIR( PLNT_CD, HIR_CD, CD_DIV_SU, HIR_CD_NM, HIR_CD_ORD, USE_YN, HIR_DESC ) VALUES ( #{plntCd}, #{hirCd}, #{cdDivSu}, #{hirCdNm}, #{hirCdOrd}, #{useYn}, #{hirDesc} )

SELECT #{hirCd} || LPAD(NVL((SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(DTL_CD, -3)) FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE HIR_CD = #{hirCd}),0)+1, 4, '0') FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SY_CD_DTL (PLNT_CD, HIR_CD, DTL_CD, DTL_NM, DTL_EN, DTL_CD_ORD, USE_YN, DTL_RMK, EXT_CD1, EXT_CD2, EXT_CD3) VALUES (#{plntCd}, #{hirCd}, #{dtlCd}, #{dtlNm}, #{dtlEn}, #{dtlCdOrd}, #{useYn}, #{dtlRmk}, #{extCd1}, #{extCd2}, #{extCd3})
mapper.update: UPDATE SY_CD_DTL SET DTL_NM = #{dtlNm}, DTL_EN = #{dtlEn}, DTL_ABBR = #{dtlAbbr}, DTL_CD_ORD = #{dtlCdOrd}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, DTL_RMK = #{dtlRmk}, EXT_CD1 = #{extCd1}, EXT_CD2 = #{extCd2}, EXT_CD3 = #{extCd3} WHERE HIR_CD = #{hirCd} AND PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND DTL_CD = #{dtlCd}
